generalRules: School starts at 8:00 AM and ends at 3:00 PM.
Students must wear the proper school uniform.
No mobile phones or electronic gadgets during school hours.
Attendance must be above 75% to appear for exams.
classroomRules: Keep your desk and surroundings clean.
Complete homework and assignments on time.
disciplineRules: Bullying or misbehavior will result in strict action.
Cheating during exams is prohibited and punishable.
Follow instructions given by staff during assemblies and events.
